text:
So basically, a placement brochure is a placard/document which gives a recruiter some details about the type of students and their qualifications and quality they can expect from them if they visit a particular institution for recruitment. It is common for institutions in India to have a placement drive where students, who are graduating, are placed in some companies who visit their institutions and recruit the chosen candidates after taking interviews, exams, etc.
A placement brochure contains details about the infrastructure of the institution, the course structure and highlights of the batch of students (who sits for the placement drive), the various activities of the departments, some past recruiters, the more important and essential question of 'why hire us?' and more details.

elements.text:
